title: Latest NFL News For Your Drafts & Madden Ratings
description:
Field Yates and Daniel Dopp discuss how the latest NFL news impacts your fantasy drafts and how the Madden ratings and fantasy ADP value compare for players heading into the 2022 NFL season. Plus, we take your questions!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
